content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":116631,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなに嫌われてるかもと不安なら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you're worried that you might be so disliked,"},{"lineNumber":116632,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分が如何に役に立つかを知らしめてやれ。","translatedEnglishLine":"make them realize how useful you are."},{"lineNumber":116633,"originalJapaneseLine":"　文句言う奴なんて自然といなくなる」","translatedEnglishLine":"People who complain will naturally disappear.\""},{"lineNumber":116634,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や、役に……立つ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-useful...\""},{"lineNumber":116635,"originalJapaneseLine":"「考えたこと……なかった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I've never... thought about that...\""},{"lineNumber":116636,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、そう暗い顔されるとうっとうしいからな、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, it's annoying when you have such a gloomy face,"},{"lineNumber":116637,"originalJapaneseLine":"　堂々としていたまえ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so hold your head up proudly.\""},{"lineNumber":116638,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes...\""},{"lineNumber":116639,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスさん、とお話していたら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Talking with Lance-san..."},{"lineNumber":116640,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お、落ち着いて、きました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've calmed down...\""},{"lineNumber":116641,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あり、がとう、ございます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-thank you very much...\""},{"lineNumber":116642,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、そうそう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, exactly."},{"lineNumber":116643,"originalJapaneseLine":"　君は笑っている方が可愛いぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You look cuter when you're smiling.\""},{"lineNumber":116644,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かわっ……って……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cu-cuter...\""},{"lineNumber":116645,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、こんにちは、ランス総統」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, hello, Supreme Leader Lance.\""},{"lineNumber":116646,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!\""},{"lineNumber":116647,"originalJapaneseLine":"ささっとニミッツはランスの背後に隠れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nimitz quickly hid behind Lance."},{"lineNumber":116648,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前な……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You, you know...\""},{"lineNumber":116649,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、す、すみません、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, s-sorry,"},{"lineNumber":116650,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、思わず……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I just blurted out...\""},{"lineNumber":116651,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、それは構わんのだが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, that's fine, but...\""},

{"lineNumber":116652,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、生きてて疲れんか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aren't you tired of living?\""},{"lineNumber":116653,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":116654,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........\""},{"lineNumber":116655,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ぁ、ぅ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ah, uh.\""},{"lineNumber":116656,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":116657,"originalJapaneseLine":"ニミッツがランスの部屋の前で、百面相していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nimitz was making all sorts of faces in front of Lance's room."},{"lineNumber":116658,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何しとるんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What are you doing?\""},{"lineNumber":116659,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひゃああああああ！？！？！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hyaaaahhhhh!?!?!\""},{"lineNumber":116660,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すすす、すみませんでしたー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-s-sorry!\""},{"lineNumber":116661,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、こらこら、待ちなさい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, hey, hey, wait."},{"lineNumber":116662,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんか用があって来たんだろうに」","translatedEnglishLine":"You must have come for some reason.\""},{"lineNumber":116663,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、なんの用だ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what do you want?\""},{"lineNumber":116664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あう……その……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... well...\""},{"lineNumber":116665,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Or rather..."},{"lineNumber":116666,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだそのいい香り漂う袋は」","translatedEnglishLine":"What's with that bag that smells so good?\""},{"lineNumber":116667,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、パン……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, bread..."},{"lineNumber":116668,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パン入ってます、これ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"There's bread in here...\""},{"lineNumber":116669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その、えと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, um..."},{"lineNumber":116670,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サチコさんが手作りパン、作ってて……","translatedEnglishLine":"Sachiko-san was making handmade bread..."},{"lineNumber":116671,"originalJapaneseLine":"　で、その……私も、教えてもらって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"And, um... I was taught how to make it too...\""},{"lineNumber":116672,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん、サチコと友達になってたんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, so you've become friends with Sachiko.\""},{"lineNumber":116673,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、ととと、とんでもない！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, no, no way!"},{"lineNumber":116674,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただ、パンの作り方を教えてもらっただけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"I just was taught how to make bread,"},{"lineNumber":116675,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わ、私なんて、そんな……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I, I am nothing like that...!\""},{"lineNumber":116676,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、友達……なんて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-a friend... or anything like that...\""},{"lineNumber":116677,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐすっ……サチコさんに失礼です……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sniff... That would be disrespectful to Sachiko-san...\""},{"lineNumber":116678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの一般人……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That ordinary person..."},{"lineNumber":116679,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人にとんでもないこと言わせてんな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Got a demon to say something outrageous...\""},{"lineNumber":116680,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、そのパン絡みの話か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, is it about that bread?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなに嫌われてるかもと不安なら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you're worried that you might be so disliked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分が如何に役に立つかを知らしめてやれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: make them realize how useful you are.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 文句言う奴なんて自然といなくなる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: People who complain will naturally disappear."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、そう暗い顔されるとうっとうしいからな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's annoying when you have such a gloomy face,
so hold your head up proudly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスさん、とお話していたら……
お、落ち着いて、きました……」
君は笑っている方が可愛いぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You look cuter when you're smiling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ささっとニミッツはランスの背後に隠れた。
ニミッツがランスの部屋の前で、百面相していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nimitz was making all sorts of faces in front of Lance's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すすす、すみませんでしたー！」
なんか用があって来たんだろうに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You must have come for some reason."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだそのいい香り漂う袋は」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's with that bag that smells so good?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サチコさんが手作りパン、作ってて……
で、その……私も、教えてもらって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And, um... I was taught how to make it too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん、サチコと友達になってたんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, so you've become friends with Sachiko."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、パンの作り方を教えてもらっただけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just was taught how to make bread,
I, I am nothing like that...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐすっ……サチコさんに失礼です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sniff... That would be disrespectful to Sachiko-san..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人にとんでもないこと言わせてんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Got a demon to say something outrageous..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
